name: Ultron
aliases: Crimson Cowl , Ultron-5, Ultron-6, Ultron-7, Ultron-8, Ultron-9, Ultron-10, Ultron-11, Ultron-12, Ultron-13, Ultron-14, Ultron-15, Ultron-16, Ultron-17, Ultron-18
powersText: Artificial intelligence with genius level intellect, abilities of robotic body vary with each redesign but generally include hidden weapons, flight, superhuman strength, durability and stamina and extreme projection of concussion blasts from his fingertips.
